language_multi_transcripts.name: username
language_multi_transcripts.description: A learner's username on the edX platform

language_multi_transcripts.name: course_id
language_multi_transcripts.description: course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

language_multi_transcripts.name: resource
language_multi_transcripts.description: The resource whose transcript is downloaded

language_multi_transcripts.name: resource_event_data
language_multi_transcripts.description: Some details about the resource whose transcript is downloade. These details are from the tracking logs

language_multi_transcripts.name: transcript_download
language_multi_transcripts.description: Number of times the resource's transcript has been downloaded by a learner

language_multi_transcripts.name: n_events
language_multi_transcripts.description: Number of events in which the language at hand was involved

language_multi_transcripts.name: last_time_used_lang
language_multi_transcripts.description: The last time the learner used the language in question

language_multi_transcripts.name: n_diff_lang
language_multi_transcripts.description: Number of different languages involved in transcript downloads

description: Table generated with SQL query file language_multi_transcripts.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks the transcript download events and the languages associated with them
